extDesc.message: The free and privacy-friendly screen recorder with no limits. Capture, annotate, edit videos and more - all with no sign in needed.

shareSandboxButton.description: Share button in sandbox editor page

stayInPagePopup.message: Stay in the page when recording

pausedRecordingToast.message: Recording paused. Press the play button to resume.

chromePermissionsModalTitle.message: Screenity doesn't have permission to record your screen

chromePermissionsModalDescription.message: To enable screen recording, you must grant Screenity permission to capture your screen when prompted.

micMutedModalDescription.message: To include audio in your recording, you'll need to unmute your microphone. Do you want to continue without audio?

setupTitle.message: Get started with Screenity in three simple steps:

setupStep1Before.description: Set up step 1, before the icon. It needs a space at the end.

setupStep1After.description: Set up step 1, after the icon. It needs a space at the beginning.

setupStep2Before.description: Set up step 2, before the icon. It needs a space at the end.

setupStep2After.description: Set up step 2, after the icon. It needs a space at the beginning.

setupStep3Before.description: Set up step 3, before the icon. It needs a space at the end.

setupStep3After.description: Set up step 3, after the icon. It needs a space at the beginning.

setupCompleteDescription.message: You can now start recording here, or in any other tab.

countdownMessage.message: Relax. Click anywhere to stop the countdown.

sandboxEditorTooSmallInfo.message: Edits may be inaccurate for short time ranges due to the intervals between frames.
sandboxEditorTooSmallInfo.description: Info about the editor being too small

processingBannerEditor.message: Video is processing, playback might be inaccurate or interrupted.

toolbarHoverOnly.message: Hide toolbar when not in use
toolbarHoverOnly.description: Only show toolbar on hover button

stopRecording.description: Stop recording button in recording scren

updateAnnouncementTitle.description: Update announcement title for existing users

updateAnnouncementDescription.message: We’re introducing a new look and many exciting features, but don’t worry, it’s still the same free, private and open source extension you know and love.
updateAnnouncementDescription.description: Update announcement description for existing users

updateAnnouncementLearnMore.description: Update announcement learn more link for existing users

updateAnnouncementButton.description: Update announcement button for existing users

streamErrorModalDescription.message: Looks like there was an error starting the recording. Restart your browser and try again. If the issue persists, please contact us at support@screenity.io.

highestQuality.description: Highest quality toggle label in popup

restoreRecording.description: Restore last recording button in popup

havingIssuesModalTitle.description: Having issues modal title in editor

havingIssuesModalDescription.message: If you've completed your recording and find yourself on this page without seeing your video, you can attempt to download the raw video data if it's available. You can also reach out and submit a bug report.
havingIssuesModalDescription.description: Having issues modal description in editor

havingIssuesModalButton.description: Having issues modal button in editor

havingIssuesModalButton2.description: Having issues modal button 2 in editor

noRecordingFound.description: No recording found alert in editor

memoryLimitDescription.message: Your device has run out of memory to record, so the recording has stopped automatically. If you'd like to record for longer, you can try lowering the quality of the video, or clearing up some space on your device.

notEnoughSpaceDescription.message: Screenity needs at least 1GB of free space to record. Please free up some space and try again.

sandboxAdvancedTitle.description: Advanced section in sandbox editor page

troubleShootButtonDescription.message: Recover your video and solve other issues

rawRecordingModalDescription.message: The raw video file is the original video file that was recorded by Screenity. This video is not processed or edited, so it may be very large and may not be playable on all devices. If you are having issues with the processed video, you can use this file to recover your video.

troubleshootModalTitle.message: Download system information and video data and send for troubleshooting

troubleshootModalDescription.message: After downloading, send the file to support@screenity.io with any relevant information. We will use this data to help you troubleshoot any issues you are having with the extension, and recover your video if possible.

overLimitModalTitle.message: The video is too long to process in your device

overLimitModalDescription.message: Since Screenity is completely private and runs locally, it's limited by your device's hardware. Processing a video of this length would take too long, and be very resource intensive. Don't worry, you can still download the WEBM file or the raw recording, but editing and MP4 export are not available. That said, you can still try to process the video anyway, if you understand the risks.

overLimitModalButton.message: I understand the risk, try anyway

overLimitModalLearnMore.message: Learn more about processing long videos.
overLimitModalLearnMore.description: Over 5 minutes limit modal learn more link with a dot

audioWarningDescription.message: To record audio from this page, you need to switch to ‘$tab$’.

extensionNotSupportedDescription.message: Screenity wasn't supported in your previous tab. You can still start your recording here and switch back to the tab, but your camera and toolbar won't be visible.
extensionNotSupportedDescription.description: Extension not supported on tab description

backupsTitle.message: Set up a local backup for your Screenity recordings

backupsDescription1.message: Keep a copy of all the recordings you make. If you don’t set up backups, your recordings will only be saved when you choose to download them.

backupsDescription2.message: You might need to create a new folder first if you're trying to save to Downloads or other system folders.

backupsOnTitle.message: Your recordings are being backed up locally

backupsOnDescription.message: To prevent being asked for permissions every time you record, we recommend leaving this tab open.

backupsConfirmTitle.message: Please reconfirm access to your local Screenity backup folder

backupsConfirmDescription.message: We’re sorry, but we need your permission once more to keep backing up your recordings. Unfortunately we will need to ask every time this tab is closed, which can happen if you close the browser or restart your computer.

backupsConfirmAllow.message: Allow Screenity to keep backing up recordings

backupPermissionFailTitle.message: Permission not granted to back up the recording

backupPermissionFailDescription.message: You didn't select a folder to backup your recordings. Depending on your browser version or operating system you might be asked to select the folder every time you start recording. You can try again, or disable backups entirely if you'd rather not give permissions repeatedly.

recordAudioWarningMacDescription.message: In macOS, you can only record Tab audio. Select the Chrome Tab option and make sure 'Also share tab audio' is enabled.

recordAudioWarningOtherDescription.message: Make sure to enable the option to 'Share system audio' if you want to record computer audio. If you don't see this option, try updating Chrome, or switch to Tab recording.

maxResolutionLabel.description: Max resolution label in settings menu

maxFPSLabel.description: Max FPS label in settings menu

notEnoughRAM.description: Not enough RAM label in settings menu

resizeWindowLabel.description: Resize window label in settings menu

screenTooSmallTooltip.message: The screen is too small for this resolution
screenTooSmallTooltip.description: Screen too small tooltip in settings menu

maxResolutionTooltip.message: Cannot record at this resolution in your device
maxResolutionTooltip.description: Maxed out resolution tooltip in settings menu
